title: Ethnicity and dependence on coerced labor

content.question: The ethnic makeup of Zacatecas, as described in the passage, can best be used as evidence of which of the following?

choices.label: The dependence of colonial economies on coerced labor
The social tensions that gave rise to the Latin American wars of independence
The development of indentured servitude as an alternative to slavery
The emergence of syncretic religious belief systems, such as Santería and Candomblé

content.answer: The dependence of colonial economies on coerced labor

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
